comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Olga Nethersole the British actress. The LOC P&P collection also has her theater posters (1, 2).

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: trialsanderrors: Thanks for connecting this up to the theatrical posters advertising  Nethersole performing in the role of Sappho.  It's interesting to see the degree to which the poster designers did (or didn't) attempt to capture her features!
